text:
@kaitlancollins @WalshFreedom As of July 13 there's 12,945,828 confirmed cases of coronavirus globally with 569,878 deaths. In USA there's  3,323,432 confirmed cases of coronavirus with 135,219 deaths. USA remains main hotspot followed by Brazil, India, Russia.
#trump #GOP total #fail #covid19
